comments.body: Is __forceinline__ not supported on ROCm? If it's not, should we introduce a preprocessor macro instead of #if-switching every occurrence.
Good catch. I think it is available in ROCm as well, according to [here](https://github.com/ROCm-Developer-Tools/HIP/blob/master/include/hip/hcc_detail/host_defines.h#L55). Will remove the macro.
